mapper.select: SELECT REG_NO, REG_DT, POST_NO, PARENT_NO, DEPTH, SEQ, IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM USER WHERE REG_NO = USER_NO),NAME) AS NAME, IP, CONTENT, PUBLIC_FL, DEL_FL FROM COMMENT WHERE POST_NO = 2 ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(PARENT_NO), REG_NO, PARENT_NO), SEQ

SELECT REG_NO, REG_DT, PARENT_NO, DEPTH, SEQ, IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM USER WHERE REG_NO = USER_NO),NAME) AS NAME, IP, CONTENT, PUBLIC_FL, DEL_FL FROM COMMENT WHERE POST_NO = #{POST_no} AND PARENT_NO = #{parent_no} AND SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT(USER_NO, POST_NO, PARENT_NO, DEPTH, SEQ, NAME, PASSWORD, CONTENT, IP, PUBLIC_FL, DEL_FL) VALUES(#{user_no},#{POST_no},#{parent_no},#{depth},#{seq},#{name},#{password},#{content},#{ip},#{public_fl},0)
